job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Develop and deploy full-stack, AI-based enterprise applications on the C3 AI Platform
   Mentor junior team members on coding standards and design techniques
   Conduct design and development reviews of customer software applications
   Test, troubleshoot, and enhance customer software applications with and on behalf of customers
   Deliver technical deep-dives, demonstrations, and customer training
   Write application specifications and documentation
   Continuously identify technical risks and gaps; devise mitigation strategies in anticipation of customer needs
   Work closely with product management and engineering to drive improvements to the overall quality of C3 AI software
job_details.full_text:
Solution Engineer

Develop and deploy full-stack, AI-based enterprise applications on the C3 AI Platform
   Mentor junior team members on coding standards and design techniques
   Conduct design and development reviews of customer software applications
   Test, troubleshoot, and enhance customer software applications with and on behalf of customers
   Deliver technical deep-dives, demonstrations, and customer training
   Write application specifications and documentation
   Continuously identify technical risks and gaps; devise mitigation strategies in anticipation of customer needs
   Work closely with product management and engineering to drive improvements to the overall quality of C3 AI software

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on developing and deploying applications on a specific platform (C3 AI Platform) and customer-facing technical tasks like reviews, testing, and training. While AI is mentioned, it lacks the depth in core AI/ML tasks like model development, fine-tuning, or MLOps specific to generative models, which are characteristic of ML or GenAI Engineer roles.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deploy full-stack, AI-based enterprise applications on the C3 AI Platform
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to building and deploying software applications, which is a core aspect of software development. The mention of 'AI-based' indicates the application's nature, but the primary action is software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Conduct design and development reviews of customer software applications
job_tasks.justification: Reviewing software designs and development processes falls under the umbrella of software engineering practices and quality assurance, which are part of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Test, troubleshoot, and enhance customer software applications
job_tasks.justification: Testing, troubleshooting, and enhancing existing software applications are fundamental activities within the software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with product management and engineering to drive improvements to the overall quality of C3 AI software
job_tasks.justification: Collaborating with product management and engineering to improve software quality implies understanding product goals and business needs to inform technical decisions.

job_tasks.phrase: Continuously identify technical risks and gaps; devise mitigation strategies in anticipation of customer needs
job_tasks.justification: Identifying risks and devising mitigation strategies, especially in anticipation of customer needs, requires understanding business context and potential impacts.
Creating specifications and documentation is a standard part of the software development process, ensuring clarity and maintainability.

job_tasks.phrase: Mentor junior team members on coding standards and design techniques
job_tasks.justification: Mentoring involves communication, knowledge transfer, and guiding others, which are key aspects of collaboration and communication skills.

job_tasks.phrase: Deliver technical deep-dives, demonstrations, and customer training
job_tasks.justification: These activities require strong communication skills to explain technical concepts to various audiences and to effectively demonstrate product capabilities.

soft_skills.phrase: Mentor junior team members on coding standards and design techniques
soft_skills.justification: Mentoring involves guiding and teaching others, which is a form of collaboration and communication.

soft_skills.phrase: Deliver technical deep-dives, demonstrations, and customer training
soft_skills.justification: Presenting technical information and training customers requires strong communication and interpersonal skills.

soft_skills.phrase: Test, troubleshoot, and enhance customer software applications
soft_skills.justification: Troubleshooting and enhancing applications involves identifying and solving technical problems.

soft_skills.phrase: Continuously identify technical risks and gaps; devise mitigation strategies
soft_skills.justification: Identifying risks and developing mitigation strategies is a core problem-solving activity.

soft_skills.phrase: Work closely with product management and engineering to drive improvements to the overall quality of C3 AI software
soft_skills.justification: Driving improvements and taking initiative to enhance software quality demonstrates ownership and a proactive approach.

soft_skills.phrase: Develop and deploy full-stack, AI-based enterprise applications on the C3 AI Platform
soft_skills.justification: Working with a specific platform like C3 AI and AI-based applications implies a need to learn and adapt to new technologies and methodologies.
